NEW_FW: Detected new firmware {0} (Current: {1}), press Ctrl+Shift+F to update
DONOT_CLOSE: DO NOT close program nor remove USB cable while updating firmware
DOWNLOAD_FW_DONE: Finished to download firmware {0}, ready to update...
FORECE_FW_UPDATE_MSG:
Restore firmware fixes firmware-related issues.
To avoid detection errors, first remove the USB device other than Web:Bit.
The Device ID could be changed after updating, please check and modify your project accordingly.
Continue?
NO_DEVICE: No device detected, please check the USB connection!
HELP_MSG:
==Shortcut Keys==
Ctrl+Shift+F: Update firmware 
Ctrl+Shift+R: Restore firmware 
Ctrl+Shift+I: Copy DeviceID to clipboard
Ctrl+Shift+W: Set WiFi settings
Ctrl+Shift+U: Switch USB connection
Ctrl+Shift+1: Set MQTT to Global server
Ctrl+Shift+2: Set MQTT to China server
COPIED_DEVICEID: Device ID [{0}] has been copied to the clipboard
DEVICE/VERSION_CONNECTED: Device [{0}] version [{1}] successfully connected by USB
CHANGE_TO_CHINA_MQTT: MQTT settings on Web:Bit board do not match current language, will not be able to use WiFi connection.\nPlease change to [China] server to fix it.
CHANGE_TO_GLOBAL_MQTT: MQTT settings on Web:Bit board do not match current language, will not be able to use WiFi connection.\nPlease change to [Global] server to fix it.
PLZ_UPDATE_FW: Please update firmware for this feature!
